Class StatusData

java.lang.Object
logic.StatusData
public class StatusData extends Object
Holds shared application state and configuration for the JavaFX client. Stores shared instances such as the DatabaseHelper, the primary Stage, and the Questions / Answers managers, as well as window sizing and a utility method for setting scenes.
